item.title: XRP Lawsuit: Ripple Gets Former SDNY Attorney To Tackle US SEC Appeal, 30% Rally Next?
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
XRP Lawsuit: Excitement brews in the XRP community as Ripple gets a former SDNY attorney in their legal battle against the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). Amid the recent exit of attorneys for Ripple Labs and executives Brad Garlinghouse and Chris Larsen, an expert attorney adds significant firepower to their defense team. XRP Community

item.title: Bitcoin (BTC) Volatility Lowest Since July 2020, History Suggests Parabolic Rally
item.dc:creator: Bhushan Akolkar
item.description:
The world’s largest cryptocurrency Bitcoin (BTC) has shown almost little to no movement over the past week and so, with volatility hitting a new low. item.title: FTX 2.0 Plans Complete Cash Payment to Creditors, Wipeout FTT Token
item.dc:creator: Bhushan Akolkar
item.description:
In the latest development, the FTX 2.0 Group has unveiled a draft-creditor repayment plan as part of its bankruptcy restructuring process. The newly revamped exchange is planning for settling customer claims in cash while wiping out its native cryptocurrency FTT token. FTX 2.0 is planning to amend this plan based on feedback from stakeholders. Thus,

The post FTX 2.0 Plans Complete Cash Payment to Creditors, Wipeout FTT Token appeared first on CoinGape.

item.description:

item.title: Terra Luna Classic Community Set To Burn 800 Million Tokens, LUNC And USTC To $1?
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
The Terra Luna Classic community favors burning 800 million USTC tokens linked to Ozone Protocol rather than returning them to the community pool. Validators and some members have introduced a counter-proposal to prominent member Vegas’ proposal to return the 800 million USTC tokens back to the community pool. Terra Luna Classic Proposal To Burn 800

item.title: LUNC News: Terra Luna Classic Key Governance And Decentralization Proposal Officially Passed
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
LUNC News: Terra Luna Classic community passed a key proposal enhancing governance and decentralization in the transition to the Commonwealth forum. With the proposal submitted by Terra Luna Classic validator Happy Catty Crypto now passed, current Commonwealth administrators need to revoke their rights and pass access to Joint L1 Task Force developer Vinh Nguyen. Terra Luna Classic

The post LUNC News: Terra Luna Classic Key Governance And Decentralization Proposal Officially Passed appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
LUNC News: Terra Luna Classic community passed a key proposal enhancing governance and decentralization in the transition to the Commonwealth forum. With the proposal submitted by Terra Luna Classic validator Happy Catty Crypto now passed, current Commonwealth administrators need to revoke their rights and pass access to Joint L1 Task Force developer Vinh Nguyen. Terra Luna Classic

The post LUNC News: Terra Luna Classic Key Governance And Decentralization Proposal Officially Passed appeared first on CoinGape.
